Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Leamington
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Cicero, Augusta, Laramie and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago/Leamington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
